titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Defense, in awarding a contract for the procurement of goods or services, to give a preference to offerors that employ veterans, and for other purposes.
Encouraging Veteran Employment Act of 2018
Encouraging Veteran Employment Act of 2018
Encouraging Veteran Employment Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
